Skip to Main Content
## Founders Club
# JOIN OUR FAMILY
## Founders Club Benefits
  * Exclusive invitations to wine club pick-up parties. * Name a row of vines at the West Hills Estate in your honor. ​​
  * Free tastings for you and 3 guests in the tasting room. (1 per person, per visit)
  * Yearly entry for a one-week stay in Sunriver for you and up to 7 guests. * 20% savings on bottles, 25% savings on cases. * 50% off a bottle of wine, enjoyed on-site. * Invitation to members-only events.
